text: 15.16 Lom 1.5, 11.13, 12.3, Gal 2.7-9, Plp 2.17 Yɨp aglek, yad Klays Jisas bɨ wog gɨñeb ne mɨdɨl, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop gɨñɨbin. Yad bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok tek wog ak gɨpin. Binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop anɨgɨl gɨñen, God Kawnan ne ak gek, binɨb Juda mel okok gos kɨli ak God yɨl amnɨgel. God yɨl amek, binɨb suŋtep ne okok yenɨgel. Kɨli anɨgɨl mɨdɨl, kɨlop tap pak sɨbog ñɨbin tek mɨdel, God kɨlop nɨgek nop tep gɨnɨmuŋ. Anɨb ak tek yad wog anɨb ak gɨl, God takaw teplep ak dad amɨl, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop agñɨbin.
